shortDescription: We maintain a very accurate registry of all military convoys on this planet. Recently, an analyst spotted something odd: a convoy that wasn't accounted for anywhere in our records. It's been regularly traveling along one of our standard logistical routes, and using our logistical comms, which is how it evaded detection for so long. Our signals intercepts tell us they're {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} drivers, so we have to assume they're smuggling right in our own backyard. We don't want to spook them with our own military comm chatter; we need an independent force to intercept and destroy them.
longDescription: Clever smugglers, hiding in plain sight. Now that their cover's blown, they'll probably call for military backup.

contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the Supply Convoy and Escape

objectiveList.title: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Convoy
objectiveList.description: The objective for destroying the convoy units.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Escorts
objectiveList.description: The objective for destroying the units guarding the convoy.

objectiveList.title: Stop Convoy from Escaping
objectiveList.description: The objective for preventing the enemy from reaching their escape point, if this happens the player will lose.

objectiveList.title: Recon the Convoy's Route
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to intercept/observe the enemy convoy.

objectiveList.title: Get to the Evac Zone
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player units escaping and finishing the mission.

objectiveList.title: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
objectiveList.description: The objective for killing the additional units that ambush you.

dialogueContent.words: According to these survey maps, you should be able to see the convoy's route from this location.
Once you have eyes on them, destroy the vehicles. Any other units are at your discretion, but there shouldn't be much opposition.
Famous last words. Commander, when you're ready for pickup, I'll meet you at this LZ.
Darius, we need to have a talk about what, exactly, you mean by 'not much opposition'.
This contract turned out to be quite a bit more exciting than we were led to believe.
We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destory, Commander.
That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
Two full lances? I'd call that a lot more opposition than we were led to believe.
Yes. This was clearly a trap, and our employers let us stumble right into it. Commander, clear out that convoy while I have a conversation with our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} contact.
Boss, those vehicles are about to leave the AO. If we lose them, we don't get paid.
One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.
Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.
